title: Gorgeous 5BR/3BTH Apartment in Great Hyde Park Location!
neighborhood: Hyde Park, Kenwood, University of Chicago
map_address: S. Ellis Ave near East Hyde Park Blvd
posting_body: ['5115 S Ellis.', 'Incredible Space!', ' Very Large Eight (8) Room, Five (5) Bedroom, Three (3) Bath, 2750 Sq.', 'Ft. renovated apt featuring:', 'Gorgeous cabinet kitchen with all stainless-steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave', 'Gleaming hardwood floors', 'Separate heated sunroom off living room', 'Tenant controlled heating and air-conditioning.', 'Free High-Speed Wi-Fi included', 'Laundry and bike storage, and additional private storage', 'Great location near transportation and U of C campus', 'Rental $3750 plus utilities.', 'No Smoking', 'No Dogs', 'For further info and/or showing call Chad Johnson, Ettinger Realty, Ltd. 847-982-3202']
